## Single Row functions


```{sql}
-- case conversion functions
UPPER()
LOWER()
INITCAP()

-- character manipulation functions
SUBSTR()
INSTR()
LENGTH()
LPAD()/RPAD()
LTRIM()/RTRIM()
REPLACE()
TRANSLATE()
CONCAT()

-- numeric functions
ROUND(<numeric_expression>, <length>)
TRUNC()
MOD()
ABS(<numeric_expression>) -- return the absolute value
POWER(<float_expression>, <power>) -- return the numeric expression to the specified power

-- date functions
MONTHS_BETWEEN()
ADD_MONTHS()
NEXT_DAY()
LAST_DAY()
TO_DATE()
ROUND()
TRUNC()
CURRENT_DATE()

-- regular expressions
REGEXP_LIKE()
REGEXP_SUBSTR()

-- other functions
NVL()
NVL2()
NULLIF()
TO_CHAR()
DECODE()
CASE()
SOUNDEX()
TO_NUMBER()

```


Case conversion functions can be used in SELECT or WHERE clauses.
